column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////So I told him that I'd do the Bourbon flight. He brought me the barrel flight. We waited a while and by the time the Bourbon Flight came
column2: we weren't much in the mood. Hubby took those shots like a champ
column3: because my tummy hurt from the Fathers Day flight. I would definitely hope that they educate their waiters better on what quality to match when the conversations are had about what the customers like. I definitely expected that from a place marketed as a Whiskey Bar.
